unnormalised: Campus hiring remains a crucial talent acquisition strategy. Dr. Sharma's report highlights the significant ROI from IIT Madras and IIM Ahmedabad graduates. We aim to onboard 20 candidates, offering competitive Rs. 8 Lakhs CTC packages. Our new Bangalore office, spanning 5000 sq ft, provides ample workspace. Placements starting August 15th will focus on diverse skillsets, reflective of India's talent pool. Successful candidates will undergo rigorous training.
